import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/CustomButton.jsx' import CartItem from '../cart-item/CartItem.jsx' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { selectCartItems } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import './CartDropdown.scss' const CartDropdown = ({cartItems}) => (
{ cartItems.length ? cartItems.map(item => ) : Your cart is empty }
console.log(state)}>GO TO CHECKOUT
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems }) export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps)(CartDropdown));
